ygData.subject: RE: Norrath Economy
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve got a level 49 bard friend who gets so sick of being begged for things that when someone runs by. Says hi, and then continues, she s been known to unload
ygData.messageBody:
I've got a level 49 bard friend who gets so sick of being begged for things
that when someone runs by. Says hi, and then continues, she's been known to
unload fine steel loot, and all her gold, silver and copper on the person
(platinum if she's on the way out) Just to say THANK YOU for not asking for
anything.

If someone asks her for help finding a corpse, she'll do that.
Just about anything else will get you a cold shoulder. ESP asking for things
that you should be out killing bats and decaying skeletons to work your way
up to.

For myself, when I have things to get rid of, I go out into a newbie area
and find someone actually killing monsters. Faerain helps those who help
themself.

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Heather Daley [mailto:blushn@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 1999 8:33 AM

>I don't have the rest of the messages for this thread, but if you are
>referring to asking people for items, cash, etc.... Rule number
>one is don't
>do it. I never ever respond to someone who asks me for things, I dislike
>beggars. I will gladly help another who merely just chats with
>me, if I get
>to talking with someone. I will offer all kinds of information
>and advise,
>as well as giving items and cash. But never never if they ask for it.
